title: Video: Mmoths – Thnx
body:
With the release of his new self-titled EP just around the corner (March 6), Irish beatmaker **Mmoths** has dropped a new video to accompany one of the cuts set to feature on the five track outing.

_Thnx_ is a drone influenced affair, manipulating and toying with the ethereal atmosphere that **Mmoths** is renowned for conjuring up, which is in turn echoed by the visuals. Mirroring each and every shot, with few of the idyllic scenes hovering on the screen for longer than a few seconds, **Feel Good Lost** have once again hit the nail on the head, with this unique, and perfectly fitting video. Check it out below.
